Returns:

tableScan

OperatorImpl tableScan(TableAtom tableAtom,
                       IntermediateDef schema)
Creates a physical instance of a table-scan operator. This operator will sequentially retrieve one tuple at a time, as opposed to index-scan or sort-scan.

Parameters:
tableAtom - the TableAtom referencing the table to scan
schema - the output schema that the returned OperatorImpl is expected to have
Returns:
an instanceof the physical table scan operator
